title: Intensive Short-Term Course Based on Visual Metaphors of the Business Model Canvas

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of fundamental business concepts and experience in strategic planning
context.additional_context: Modular Instruction in a Blended Environment Focused on Smartphone-Based Learning Utilizing Visual Metaphor Materials

learning_goals: Learners can explain the nine components of the Business Model Canvas with 80% accuracy by linking them to visual metaphors
Learners achieve 70% applicability when applying visual metaphor-based BMC templates to real business cases
Learners improve their BMC proposals to a clarity score of 4.0/5.0 or higher through peer evaluation

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
